forecast-period.text: A surface trough stretches from the Central West coast, across the southern Gascoyne and into the Interior of the State with a ridge of high pressure well south of the State. The trough near the west coast will move eastwards during Monday afternoon. A ridge of high pressure will develop near the southwest of the State on Tuesday.
For latest warnings go to www.bom.gov.au, subscribe to RSS feeds, call 1300-659-213* or listen for warnings on relevant TV and radio broadcasts.
* Calls to 1300 numbers cost around 27.5c incl. GST, higher from mobiles or public phones.
Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. The chance of a thunderstorm, with possible heavy falls in the south early this evening. Winds east to southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h.

Partly cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers in the east, most likely in the morning and afternoon. Near zero chance of rain elsewhere. The chance of a thunderstorm. Heavy falls exceeding 50 mm possible in the south. Winds east to northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h turning north to northwesterly in the morning then tending northeast to southeasterly in the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between 19 and 24 with daytime temperatures reaching 24 to 39.
UV Alert from 8:40 am to 3:40 pm, UV Index predicted to reach 11 [Extreme]

Partly cloudy. Medium (40%) chance of showers in the afternoon and evening. The chance of a thunderstorm. Winds northeast to southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h tending north to northwesterly in the middle of the day then tending southeast to southwesterly in the late afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to between 18 and 25 with daytime temperatures reaching 28 to 38.

Partly cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers in the east, slight (30%) chance elsewhere. The chance of a thunderstorm. Winds southeast to southwesterly 20 to 30 km/h. Overnight temperatures falling to the low to mid 20s with daytime temperatures reaching 27 to 35.

Partly cloudy. Medium (40%) chance of showers in the north in the afternoon and evening. Slight (20%) of showers int he south during the morning. The chance of a thunderstorm in the north int he afternoon and evening. Winds south to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h tending east to southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h during the morning then tending south to southeasterly during the day. Overnight temperatures falling to between 18 and 23 with daytime temperatures reaching 26 to 35.
